messages.subject: Northeast Unschooling Conference 2010 Registration Open
messages.msgSnippet: The web site for the 2010 Northeast Unschooling Conference is up and ready for registrations and hotel reservations! The conference will take place August
messages.messageBody:
The web site for the 2010 Northeast Unschooling Conference is up and ready
for registrations and hotel reservations!

The conference will take place August 26-29, 2010, again at the gorgeous
Sheraton Colonial Hotel in Wakefield, MA, a short drive from Boston and
Salem. We're still working on the program, but presenters will include Peter
Gray, Ren Allen, Caroline Bays, and Maureen Carey, and awesome singer Carsie
Blanton will be with us to perform and to present! Lots of surprises are
pending!

I have completely redone the site with a gorgeous photo taken at the 2009
picnic by Dagny Kream. Please check it out. Also, if you run into any
problems with links or anything else on the site, please let me know.

Kathryn



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
